content:
US Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brinka commented on a Russian rocket strike, which was inflicted on March 25, 2024 in Kiev.

About it is in hermessage.

“This morning, Russia again attacked Ukraine with hypersonic missiles. Loud explosions in Kiev. In the last 5 days, Russia has launched hundreds of rockets and drones against a sovereign country, ”Bridget Brinkk said.

According to her, Ukraine needs help from the United States now.

"You can't lose a minute," the US ambassador to Ukraine emphasized.

SeePhoto reportArmyinform with the consequences of the attack on March 25, 2024 to Kiev.
title: US Ambassador responded to Russian ballistic blow to Kiev
description: This is stated in her message. “This morning Russia attacked Ukraine again ...
author: Army Inform
